title: In its report for 1890, the United States Censu...

content.question: In its report for 1890, the United States Census Bureau indicated that

choices.label: industrialization was closing the gap in wealth between rich and poor
the United States had more Catholics than Protestants
the American frontier could no longer be distinguished from settled areas
infant mortality was no longer a serious problem
Boston was the second largest city in the United States

content.answer: the American frontier could no longer be distinguished from settled areas

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
